text: Hi Sarah, I run a software agency in the uk and specialise in working with HubSpot and HubSpot api. Happy to jump on a call and see how we can help.
Hiyo! I'm a designer/dev who does a bit of everything :slightly_smiling_face: I wouldn't call myself, 'fantastic', but I suppose I'm not too shabby! <https://amandamcintosh.design/>
